meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4400.

td.p: Randy Childs, a high school teacher from Los Angeles, California
Mary Curtis, an editor and columnist from Charlotte, North Carolina
Mike Garabedian, a graduate student from Whittier, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,401)

tr.td: HISTORIC GROUPS
IT'S TIME FOR SPORTS
COLORFUL WORDS & PHRASES
WOMEN'S HEALTH
PLACES TO GO
THINGS TO "C"
